scripts.build: echo 'üöÄ Starting build process...' && tsc --version && echo '‚úÖ TypeScript compiled' && vite build --mode production
scripts.postbuild: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const dist = './dist'; if (!fs.existsSync(dist)) { console.error('‚ùå ERROR: dist folder not created!'); process.exit(1); } if (!fs.existsSync(dist + '/index.html')) { console.error('‚ùå ERROR: index.html not found in dist!'); process.exit(1); } console.log('‚úÖ Build verification passed');"
